speakerBio: Billy Carson is the Best Selling Author of 'The Compendium Of The Emerald Tablets' and is an expert host on Deep Space, a new original streaming series by Gaia. This series explores the Secret Space Program, revealing extraordinary technologies and their potential origins. Billy Carson also serves as an expert host on Gaia’s original series, Ancient Civilizations, in which a team of renowned scholars deciphers the riddles of our origins and pieces together our forgotten history documented in monuments and texts around the world.
descriptionLong:
Schedule

Saturday, April 25, 2020: 9:00 am - 5:00 pm (VIP Reception - 5:00 pm - 6:00 pm)

Venue

Join us at Gaia’s headquarters outside of Boulder, Colorado at our new, state-of-the-art event space nestled in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains and less than 30 minutes from Denver. Here you’ll have the opportunity to experience exclusive events with your favorite luminaries in an intimate setting.

Address: 833 W South Boulder Road, Louisville, CO 80027
title: The Chronicles of the Anunnaki
overview:
Join like minded members and human origin seekers as Billy Carson, best selling author of "The Compendium of The Emerald Tablets" and a Gaia.com show guest and expert talent, presents The Chronicles of the Anunnaki. Billy will dive deep into the Annunaki bloodline and civilization structure to help us understand how it relates to our modern day experience.

Questions?

Please email tickets@gaia.com
